definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible

definition: at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府现在有责任采取有诚意的行动。

sentences.english: Lord, we are responsible for much of the suffering in this world.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，我们对世界上的苦难要付上大部分的责任。

sentences.english: But it is their responsibility, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 但那确实是他们的责任，”他说。

sentences.english: Generally, travel agencies out there with a travel agency liability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，跟旅行社出游会有一份旅行社责任险。

sentences.english: Thereby , the basis of penal responsibility of ministration defect sin is varied .
sentences.chinese: 职务过失犯罪刑事责任的根据呈多元性的特点。

sentences.english: Include the company details and your job title and responsibilities there.
sentences.chinese: 包括该公司的细节和您的职衔和责任。

sentences.english: There is stronger sense of responsibility, with society honor versus dishonor view.
sentences.chinese: 有较强的责任感，和社会荣辱观。

sentences.english: You are responsible for sustaining well-informed and motivated Rotary clubs.
sentences.chinese: 您有责任提供最新的资讯并激励著扶轮社。

sentences.english: It is the customer's responsibility to close out hedges if they wish to do so.
sentences.chinese: 这是客户的责任来将锁单平仓，如果他们愿意这么做。

sentences.english: But do you imagine that I shall leave Catherine to his duty and humanity?
sentences.chinese: 可是你以为我就会把凯瑟琳交给他的责任和仁爱吗？

sentences.english: Chapter III discusses the legal foundations of fault liability in conclusion contract.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，缔约过失责任的法律基础。

sentences.english: They are too conscientious and responsible to drive like manias .
sentences.chinese: 妇女格外谨慎，责任心也强，不会像狂人一样开飞车。
第二章“政府推进企业社会责任的制度建设”。

sentences.english: Congress has a moral and legal obligation to oversee institutions it brings into existence.
sentences.chinese: 国会有道义上和法律上的责任来监督它所建立的机构。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen has done his duty in this well.
sentences.chinese: 陈先生为这口井已尽了自己的责任。

sentences.english: It is our bounden duty to help the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人是我们义不容辞的责任。

definition: to avoid (esp. responsibility)/to shift (the blame)/to pass the buck
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
